DOC.brief_summary: This study's primary objective is to determine the independent and combined effects of progressive resistance muscle strength training and testosterone on the development of sustainable improvements in physical function.
DOC.brief_title: Physiologic Effects of PRMS & Testosterone in the Debilitated Elderly
DOC.criteria: The study will be limited to those patients who are metabolically stable and free of metastatic cancer and limiting end organ disease. Their total serum testosterone must be less than 480 and PSA less than 10.
